runs.comm: short of a good length outside off, at 149 kmph, leaves it alone to the keeper
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and guides it behind point for a single
stays on the pads, worked away behind square, gets a single
hurls it hard down the leg side, Gayle doesn't get a touch to it, Haddin does well stretching to his right but concedes a run
that was a swipe, short on the off and he tried to dispatch it over midwicket, got a thick edge over the slips for a boundary
sliding on the pads, clipped away through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
beaten this time, short of a good length outside off, moves away as he tries to defend it off the back foot, misses and zips through to the keeper
starts with a wide, slides it down the leg side, false start
beaten this time, short of a good length outside off and moves away, shaping away from Gayle who defends inside the line and misses
shortish on middle, gets across and works it away towards square leg
bowls it on a length on the off, gets across and defends it towards mid-off with a straight bat
short of a length outside off and shoots away, Dowlin tries his best to nick it but fails
bowled it on a good length and he tried to pull it! Got on the back foot and tried to play it past midwicket but the shot wasn't on, struck him on the elbow

short outside off, pretty wide and he went for another pull and, not for the first time, miscued it, got it over the covers and fortunately for him, it landed in front of three fielders converging on that one
pushes him back with that length delivery on the off stump, bowled at 149 kmph, defended towards cover
short down the leg side, tries to whip it past fine leg, doesn't get his bat to it, bowled at a fiery pace, 152.6 kmph
slowed it down just a hint, short outside off and Gayle, in typical Gayle fashion, played his trademark whip with a leg up, but a very restrained one at that
senses a chance this time, full and wide, tried to thump that past the bowler, it just escaped the outside edge
bowled it full outside off, pushed inside the line and it went past him, the frustration grows
bowls it on a good length, a slower ball by Taitean standards, 130.9 kmph, defended to extra cover
another mistimed pull again lands him in trouble, shortish, tried to pull it past midwicket but got it a little high on the bat and it ended up landing just short of a diving Hussey at mid-on
That's the Gayle we know, full on the pads and he picks it up beautifully, clipping it over midwicket for a boundary
a big one, just a jab that, short on middle and leg and he just helped it on its way over the deep square-leg boundary, Gayle's away

but that's all we have from him, attempts a similar shot to a ball bowled short outside off, gets the top edge this time and Steve Smith, at third man, runs in a few yards to complete a well-judged catch
driven off the back foot towards mid-on for a single
gone! Bowls it on a length outside off, tries to drive it through the line, gets a thick outside edge and Cameron White at second slip makes no mistake, a first-ball duck for Morton
short of a length outside off, punched hard off the back foot to extra cover
nicely played, looks good when he plays conventionally, short of a good length and he cuts it past point for a couple of runs
slightly short outside off, plays away from his body and mistimes a back-foot punch to point
the pull works this time, short on middle, moves back, gets into position and smacks it past square leg to beat fine leg to the ropes
bowled it full outside off, dug it out towards cover
short of a length on middle, worked away off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
pushed it off the front foot towards mid-on
moving away from the right-hander, tries to drive it hard past cover, it beats the outside edge
mistimed pull to mid-on, rushed through for a single and made it though he was in trouble had David Hussey aimed accurately at the non-striker's end
short of a good length on the off, moves front and across and defends it to cover
hits hard through the line but straight to mid-on
brilliantly fielded by Harris on his follow-through, bowled on a length outside off and Pollard smacks it straight back towards him, dives forward and pulls off an excellent save
short of a good length outside off, too wide, tries his best to reach it but can't
beaten this time, tried to open the face to guide it towards third man, missed
full outside off, in the slot, drives it hard but straight towards mid-off
short of a good length on middle, gets back to work it into the leg side, plays it back on the pitch and snatches a quick single
short of a length outside leg stump, doesn't play at it, surprisingly it's not called a wide
Pollard makes way and drags that short one towards deep square leg for a single
lovely shot, pitched up outside off, makes a bit of room and creams it through the off side, wide of mid-off, for a boundary
short of a good length, chops it wide of point for a single
guided delicately down to third man for a single
pushing at it away from his body, gets a thick outside edge wide of third man for a couple of runs
played away into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
angling it on the pads, clips the pads and rolls in the direction of Tait at fine leg for a couple of runs, actually three
Pollard's gone, a wild swing to a ball bowled on a good length on the off, misses and the off stump is pegged back, a big blow for West Indies
cracked away towards deep point for a single
bowled it on a good length outside off, keeps a little low and zips through to the keeper

another wicket falls, dropped into the off side and Hinds calls for a single, he's struggling to make it to the other end as the throw from point is collected by Steve Smith at the non-striker's end. the stumps are broken and Hinds is just short, the replays confirm he's out
wild swing, bowled on a good length on the off and tries to pull it through square leg, misses and it just goes over the stumps
banged in short and he goes for another pull, miscued yet again but it lands safely behind square
bowls it on a good length outside off, pushes at it from the crease, misses
played away towards deep midwicket for a single
bowled it full on the off, pushed from the crease towards mid-on for a quick single, makes it in time, Warner hits the stumps direct but he's just made it back. They take another run on a ricochet
short of a length on the off, slaps it towards deep midwicket for a single
slower one, dropped with a closed face into the leg side for a single
short of a length on the off, knocked into the leg side off the back foot, contemplated taking a single there but decided against it wisely
short of a length outside off, tries to continue to attack, mistimes a drive on the up towards mid-on
angling in towards middle and leg, bowled at 135.5 kmph, defended into the leg side
full and wide, almost had his first wicket there, tried to smack it over his head, got a thick outside edge but landed short of Tait at third man
bowls it on a good length on the off, chips it over the bowler's head for a couple between long-on and long-off

Steve Smith is outstanding in the outfield, he took two beauties in the last game but he's bettered them here, bowled on a length outside off and he swung it hard in the direction of deep square leg, Smith was a few yards inside the boundary and it forever seemed it would elude him but he timed his jump to perfection, held on, it popped out for a moment but he somehow juggled and clasped it while diving backwards, brilliant effort
short of a length on the off, eased through point and cover for a single
turning in from a good length outside off, defended with a closed face into the leg side
flighted outside off, chips it over the in-field on the off side for a couple of runs

Harris can't do a Steve Smith, tossed up outside off, strikes it cleanly over long-on but Harris did have a chance, tried to dive backwards but couldn't hold on, it would qualify as a drop, he was standing well inside the ropes there and didn't time his jump quite well enough, went through his hands
pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket for a couple of runs
Smith's unlucky with the ball, it's flighted and lands full, goes for the drive, gets a thick edge past a diving slip to the third-man boundary

West Indies lose another one, bowled it full outside off, lofted it inside out towards deep cover and Warner did well, taking a few steps forward, getting underneath the ball and pouching it inches from the ground
short and wide, cut away hard over point for a single
short of a length, tries to open the face and dab it in the direction of third man, misses
bowls it on a length outside off, gets outside the line to defend, gets an inside edge onto his pads and he races across for a single
short of a length, cuts uppishly but it lands safely, wide of third man for a single
bowls it on a good length on the off, pushed back towards the bowler
bowls it short on middle and leg from round the wicket, worked it away towards fine leg for a single
three converging fielders and it lands safe, short of a good length and he tries to smack it over extra cover, miscues it over point instead and is fortunate to sill be out there batting
taps it into the off side in the direction of extra cover for a single
short of a length on the off, knocks it down into the leg side for a single
bowls it on a good length outside off, makes room and slaps it towards wide mid-off
slightly short on the off, eased off the front foot towards deep cover for a single
short of a length, taps it behind Clarke at point for a quick single
swings in towards middle, gets his front foot across and drives it to mid-on for a single
tries to dispatch that over the off-side field, a touch too wide though, can't get to it
hurls it full outside off, makes room to crack it through the covers, misses
cut away in the direction of deep point for a single
bowls it short on middle, ducks under it to allow it to the keeper
short of a good length on middle, swivels and tries to pull it behind square, mistimes it but manages a single
bangs it short on middle, goes for the pull but he can't connect, through to the keeper again
bowls it short outside off, slaps it wide of extra cover for a single
short outside off, makes room to cut it over point, gets a thick edge and lands wide of Harris at third man, dives but lets it through him to the boundary
the ball's chasing Harris, short and he goes for the pull, thick edge again, lands well in front of Harris who gets his body behind it this time
short and wide, makes room to cut that over third man but can't find enough to beat him, got plenty of elevation and Warner ran forward to complete a sharp catch
bowls it full down the leg side, walks across to clip it fine, doesn't get his bat to it
pushes it off the front foot towards extra cover to steal a single, brings up the 100, been a bit of a struggle this
bowls it on a good length outside off, makes room to drill it through the covers but can't get his bat to it
short on middle, whips it through to deep square leg for a single
full toss on middle, moves across and uses his wrists to work it towards deep square leg for a couple of runs
bowls it full on the off, makes room and chips it through the in-field for one more
short outside off, struck high over cover just in front of Smith for a single
fullish on middle, driven towards long-off for one more
bowls it full on middle, driven through the line towards long-on for a single
superbly driven, bowled it full on middle and he got into position early to smash that past the bowler to beat the fielders in the V
bowled it short on middle, went for the pull, got a top edge and it fell short of fine leg, two more to the total
short of a length on the off, jabbed towards mid-off for a single
stays back in the crease and taps it into the leg side for a single
a valiant attempt by Christian running to his left from long-off but he can't get to it, short of a length and it's timed beautifully, punched uppishly to beat the fielder to the ropes
short of a length on middle, goes for the pull but it comes on to him really quickly, ends up playing it to mid-on and sneaks a single, struck on the glove and he's in some pain
saw him walking across there and fired it full on the off, all Deonarine could do was play it back to the bowler
hurls it in the blockhole on middle, digs it out wide of midwicket for a couple of runs
full outside off, driven hard and uppish towards Steve Smith at deep cover for a single, lands on the bounce and he returns a powerful throw
short on the off, swats it in the direction of long-on, Harris takes a while to get to it, they run back for the second, though a direct hit at the striker's end would have found the batsman short
low full toss outside off, stretches and plays it out to deep cover
a long overdue hit over the fence, low full toss on middle, makes way and swings it over the ropes between deep square leg and deep midwicket for a six
Christian's figures have been damaged in this last over, gifts Sammy a length ball, he gets under it and deposits it miles over the ropes over long-on
